source.generate: SCHEMA: md(name, salary, manager) INSTANCE: md(name: "Bob", salary: "1000", manager: "John")

target.generate: SCHEMA: emp(name, dept, salary, manager) INSTANCE: emp(name: "Bob", dept: "Marketing", salary: "1000", manager: "John") emp(name: "John", dept: "Marketing", salary: "2000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "John", dept: "Marketing", salary: "3000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Mark", dept: "Staff", salary: "1000", manager: "Frank") emp(name: "Frank", dept: "Sales", salary: "2000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "John", dept: "Sales", salary: "2500", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Carl", dept: "Marketing", salary: "2500", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "John", dept: "Staff", salary: "2500", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Bob", dept: "Staff", salary: "2500", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Carl", dept: "Managment", salary: "5000", manager: "Carl")

scenario.dependencies: ExtEGDs: e1: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $d1 != $d2 -> $n1 == $n2.
